sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import dynamic from "next/dynamic"; const Editor = dynamic(import ('for-editor'),{ ssr: false}); const md = '> `for-editor` is a markdown editor\n' + '\n' + '# for-editor\n' + '\n' + 'this is a markdown editor\n' + '\n' + '## for-editor\n' + '\n' + 'this is a markdown editor\n' + '\n' + '### for-editor\n' + '\n' + '```js\n' + 'const editor = \'for-editor\'\n' + '```\n' + '\n' + '- item1\n' + ' - subitem1\n' + ' - subitem2\n' + ' - subitem3\n' + '- item2\n' + '- item3\n' + '\n' + '---\n' + '\n' + '1. item1\n' + '2. item2\n' + '3. item3\n' + '\n' + '### table\n' + '\n' + '| title | description |\n' + '| ---------- | --------------- |\n' + '| for-editor | markdown editor |\n' interface Interface { } const Index: React.FC = (props) => { const [md, setMd] = useState(''); return (
); } export default Index
